TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UIPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class UIPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class UIPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type UIPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

Docs.summary: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the Clipboard. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Windows 中的绘制和用户输入的事件是用户界面。
使用 windows 的权限可以是以下之一： 不受限制，限制为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows>，则只<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeSubWindows>，或没有绘制的窗口或用户输入事件允许的访问。 <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeTopLevelWindows> 和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.SafeSubWindows>标题和大小，以避免通过潜在的有害代码可能欺骗限制。
使用剪贴板的权限可以是以下之一： 没有剪贴板访问权限允许或不受限制，只写。 粘贴限制阻止可能有害的应用程序而无需用户的同意，同时仍允许剪切、 复制和粘贴操作时由用户通过键盘命令启动剪贴板中获取数据。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

Docs.param: A permission to intersect with the current permission. It must be the same type as the current permission.
Docs.summary: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
Docs.returns: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission. This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。 具体而言，它表示的权限级别最低值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard>中当前权限和指定的权限。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission.Intersect%2A>方法。 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission>类。
> [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。
[!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UIPermission/CPP/uipermission.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UIPermission/CS/uipermission.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UIPermission/VB/uipermission.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

Docs.param: A permission to test for the subset relationship. This permission must be the same type as the current permission.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
Docs.returns: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果成功用于当前权限的所有要求也成功都完成指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。 它是指定的权限至少包含的子集中包含的权限。 有关<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>返回`true`，这两个<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard>当前权限的值必须等于或比指定权限的值不太宽松。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission.IsSubsetOf%2A>方法。 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission>类。
> [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

Docs.param: A permission to combine with the current permission. It must be the same type as the current permission.
Docs.summary: Creates a permission that is the union of the permission and the specified permission.
Docs.returns: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 对的调用结果<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission.Union%2A>是表示由当前的权限表示的所有操作，以及由指定权限表示的所有操作的权限。 具体而言，它表示的最大权限值<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow>和<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard>中当前权限和指定的权限。
